works.description: The work contains copyrighted text and/or images which are being used directly from our website (ShapeFit.com). We have created and own 100% of the copyright to all of our unique content on our site. Unfortunately, spammers and other scrapers are stealing our copyrighted content and are using it on their websites. I have included the offending websites (URLs) below for your review. Some of the websites have removed our content but their URL's are still displaying on the search results when performing a Google search. Please remove the entries from your search results. Thank you.
